languages.text: {n}Свита колеблется. Кажется, ваш аргумент звучит достаточно убедительно, чтобы хотя бы посеять тень сомнения в их умах.{/n}
{n}Your retinue hesitates. It seems your argument sounds convincing enough to plant a seed of doubt in their minds, at least.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Свита колеблется. Кажется, ваш аргумент звучит достаточно убедительно, чтобы хотя бы посеять тень сомнения в их умах.{/n}

{n}Your retinue hesitates. It seems your argument sounds convincing enough to plant a seed of doubt in their minds, at least.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的随行人员犹豫起来。你的论点听起来确实很有说服力，在他们的脑海中种下了怀疑的种子。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your retinue hesitates. It seems your argument sounds convincing enough to plant a seed of doubt in their minds, at least.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的随行人员犹豫起来。你的论点听起来确实很有说服力，在他们的脑海中种下了怀疑的种子。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los miembros de tu séquito titubean. Al parecer, tu argumento ha sido lo bastante convincente para sembrar la semilla de la duda en sus mentes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your retinue hesitates. It seems your argument sounds convincing enough to plant a seed of doubt in their minds, at least.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los miembros de tu séquito titubean. Al parecer, tu argumento ha sido lo bastante convincente para sembrar la semilla de la duda en sus mentes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maiyetin tereddüt ediyor. Görünüşe göre argümanını, en azından zihinlerine şüphe tohumu ekecek kadar ikna edici buluyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your retinue hesitates. It seems your argument sounds convincing enough to plant a seed of doubt in their minds, at least.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Maiyetin tereddüt ediyor. Görünüşe göre argümanını, en azından zihinlerine şüphe tohumu ekecek kadar ikna edici buluyorlar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}従者たちは言葉に詰まる。あなたの根拠が少なくとも彼らの心に疑いの種を植えるのには十分なようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your retinue hesitates. It seems your argument sounds convincing enough to plant a seed of doubt in their minds, at least.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}従者たちは言葉に詰まる。あなたの根拠が少なくとも彼らの心に疑いの種を植えるのには十分なようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre entourage hésite. À défaut d'être entièrement convaincant, votre argument semble avoir au moins semé le doute dans leur esprit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your retinue hesitates. It seems your argument sounds convincing enough to plant a seed of doubt in their minds, at least.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre entourage hésite. À défaut d'être entièrement convaincant, votre argument semble avoir au moins semé le doute dans leur esprit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dein Gefolge zögert. Offenbar ist dein Argument aber immerhin überzeugend genug, um Zweifel zu säen.{/n}
